title: Hot Springs National Park: Donate
body: Make a Donation       Thank you for your interest in supporting Hot Springs National Park. Your donation will enhance the programs and activities to protect park resources and provide visitor services for the park. Philanthropic contributions continue to make a significant difference and we welcome and are grateful for your support. There are several ways of supporting Hot Springs National Park. The park is able to accept donations. If you are interested in donating directly to the park, you may contact the Superintendent by phone at 501-620-6730 or by e-mail. Donations may also be sent to: Superintendent, Hot Springs National Park, 101 Reserve Street, Hot Springs AR  71901.
